## Products (Spokes)

- **Zuora Billing**: Subscription management and invoicing engine.
  - Link: /billing.llms.txt
  - Description: Manage accounts, subscription lifecycle, usage rating, and automated billing generating invoices, credit memos and debit memos.
  - Orders and Invoice Settlement features are assumed enabled

- **Zuora Payments**: Global payment collections and gateway integration.
  - Link: /payments.llms.txt
  - Description: Handle electronic payment collections, PCI-compliant payment methods, gateway integrations, and refunds.
  - Core Zuora Billing Payments functionality only, Collections will have it's own llms.txt but that's not available now.

- **Zuora Revenue**: Revenue recognition automation.
  - Link: /revenue.llms.txt
  - Description: Automate revenue recognition schedules, accounting codes, and compliance (ASC 606/IFRS 15).

- **Zephr**: Digital identity and experience orchestration. (Future)
  - Description: Manage user identity, paywalls, and digital experiences.
